verses.name: Ezekiel 16:31
verses.text: In that thou buildest thine eminent place in the head of every way, and makest thine high place in every street; and hast not been as an harlot, in that thou scornest hire;

verses.name: Ezekiel 16:32
verses.text: But as a wife that committeth adultery, which taketh strangers instead of her husband!

verses.name: Ezekiel 16:33
verses.text: They give gifts to all whores: but thou givest thy gifts to all thy lovers, and hirest them, that they may come unto thee on every side for thy whoredom.
